name: air_terminal_supply_downstream_leak_to_return
display_name: Air Terminal Supply Downstream Leak to Return

arguments.name: airterminal_choice
arguments.display_name: Enter the name of the faulted AirTerminal object

arguments.name: leak_ratio
arguments.display_name: Ratio of leak airflow between 0 and 0

modeler_description: To use this Measure, choose the Coil:Cooling:DX:SingleSpeed object to be faulted and a fault level. Define the fault level as the ratio of the amount of refrigerant inside the object to the charge level recommended by the manufacturer. If the fault level is outside the range of zero and one, an error will occur.
description: This Measure simulates the effect of air leakages from the supply to return air without going into the zone.
